_sText:
CHECK OUT MGPRODUCTIONS NEW BIG MAP
http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/92609

Deathrun_Horrorhousecomplete

Finally after 50 versions the ultimate death run challenge is complete!

Secrets:
Pacman secret 1
Pacman secret 2
Sky room with explosives and jacusi
Room With car
Cock Room
Button that makes T's Go mega slow
Laser that follows you
Hot Ladies secret
Speed Boost Secret
grenade hole!
secret ladder leading to room where you become a ghost

Traps:
1.Nightmare on Elm Street- freddy's glove
2.Saw 1- Jigsaw's trap
3.Braindead - lawnmower
4.Critters 2- Critters ball
5.Poltergeist- Ghost
6.Jaws Shark- attack
7.Evil dead 2- ash's gun
8.Hellraiser- pinhead's pins
9.The shining- Axe
10.Eraserhead- Vortex of doom
11.Killer klowns from outer space- Spaceship
12.Candyman- death mirror
13.Aliens- Alien attack
14.Predator- Laser beam
15.Silent hill- 1/9 chance random trap
16.The thing- Blood test scene
17.Wishmaster- Roundabout
18.Carrie Pig's- blood scene
19.Sixth Sense- i see dead people
20.King kong- Arm stomp!
21.The ring- ring
22.Friday 13th- Jason's Swinging arm
23.Halloween - Michale's Swinging arm
24.Leprechaun- death box
25.Zombi- Zombie attack!
26.Texas chainsaw massacre- Chainsaw
27.Exorcist- Projectile vomit
28.Physco- Shower scene
29.Chucky- Chucky attack
30.Chucky- Suprise attack!

Random Events:
1.Lightning bolt to tree
2. Random ghost that does 2-10 damage
3. Random ghost that does 2-10 damage
4. Random Exorcist girl appears screaming at your face!

Custom materials : over 80!
Custom Sounds: Over 30!!

This map is jam packed with so much excitement and fun your head might explode!
Never has a death run map jammed so much into one bundle!!

More Secrets
No Trap Glitches! XD


PURE FUN!!

Made for my love of horror.

IMPORTANT: FOR THIS MAP TO WORK TYPE THIS IN CONSOLE OR IN YOUR SEVER.CFG!! net_maxfilesize 50

DON'T FORGET TO BZ2 IT XD

UPDATES:
Map has been updated

Eraserhead trap more deadly
wishmaster trap actually does something now!
new advertising
sky fixed in begining room so it doesnt cut out tree's
new secret added
NOW OVER 60+ SLOTS
begining room is bigger to fit everyone!
fixed texture issues
fixed final trap how there is two chuckies instead of one
new secret + new random event!
Ending evil dead room can now have ct's walk in and out.. but t's cant get in!
more ambient_generic sounds to give it a tad more of a spooky feel!
